about_the_game:
Experience a point & click time management game that puts your multi-tasking to the test. Use the computer and other gadgets around the tower to complete your nightly checklist.
But watch out! The research subjects from the lab below tend to wander a bit at night. Use all methods at your disposal to dissuade them.

Complete all of your tasks before sunrise or YOU'RE FIRED!

Congratulations on your new position as a watchtower attendant!

On behalf of the Eclipse Research Foundation, welcome to our family!

Your role is vital in securing, and protecting, our state-of-the-art research facility. Nightly duties will consist of stimulating, and engaging, tasks such as:

Answering phone calls!

Checking your email!

Updating software!

A gentle reminder: All required tasks must be complete by 8:00AM, no exceptions. Failure will result in immediate termination.

Here at the Eclipse Research Foundation, our mission is pushing the human-limit to its maximum potential. Although our research team is comprised of the best & brightest, breakthrough experimentation can have unpredictable results.

Should you detect any subjects in your tower, simply follow the ARM protocol:

  • A — Alarm

  • R — Report

  • M̸̗̰̪̼͉̀ ̴̘̱̱̑̀̊̂-̸̖̟͍͓̉̔̄͜-̵̼̹̺̳̈̍̍ͅ ̷̨͉͈͝.̴̳̪̰͚͊̽́̿/̸̼̜̒ͅ`̴̣̿~̶̧̮̲͎͓̔́̆

Under no circumstance should ANY unauthorized employee interact with subjects. Failure to comply will result in immediate termination. If you suspect any personnel of interacting with subjects, report it to your supervisor immediately.

We know you'll be a perfect fit on our team! On behalf of everyone at the Eclipse Research Foundation, we welcome you!
And always remember, Don't Forget the Phone.

© 20XX Eclipse Research Foundation
